column5: Did you travel in one of these?
YUMMY!!!!!  Looks like a fun day
Great production value here! You take ice fishing vids to a new level , thx for sharing it

Thanks all again for the positive feedback!  Good stuff man! How are those spring bobbers treating ya? Which bobbers?  It is nice to be young and talented. Now I know why the old timers way back when invited us to ice fish with them, drill the many holes for them with manual augers and set up the old Army tent. My 1st ever ice trip was on Couch. Ever thought about getting a few sled dogs?  Don't want to sound like a broken record but cool video guys, keep up the great work.  I have to say you guys sure fit a lot of equipment into that little red SUV you drive. Thanks again! Its always great to hear.  Did you travel in one of these?   It was a mazda 3 hatchback
We had pretty good luck last week. Landed at least 25-30 fish each per day. Would have been S.O.L without the fishfinder though!
We had pretty good luck last week. Landed at least 25-30 fish each per day. Would have been S.O.L without the fishfinder though!  I am thinking that should be your next investment buddy  lol
Great video! The editing is perfect!!!  How many cameras did you shoot this with?
Not including my cell phone for that opening shot,  I used 5 cameras there.  Lol
awesome!  you guys have a great set up?  great watch thanks!!!

Great video once again, that looked like fun, minus the lugging of the equipment.   Btw, I really like that portable fish finder setup, is that a custom build?  Or did it come that way?  Would like to make the exact same setup as that.  Any info would be appreciated.  Your other video's on your channel are cool too.
Great catch! Chris K and I were there too yesterday in about 7 FOW. lots of 5 inchers and enough in the 8-9 inch range for a small snack. Was still a great day.
Very cool video, thanks for sharing
cool video, looks like an awesome day
cool video..!
great job on the video, that must have taken a lot of editing and a few cameras ....

Very cool video... I'm more and more impressed every time you post one.  I'm not sure if it's the camara angle or not.... But that hut looks like a mansion! Especially the inside shots.  What a great day of fishing guys.  As do St. John, where did you check on the ice? Usually St john freezes up before the cooch  G
Wow great first trip of 2015. How thick is the ice at Couchiching? Cool video, by the way.

Thanks all for the kind words.   Great video once again, that looked like fun, minus the lugging of the equipment.   Btw, I really like that portable fish finder setup, is that a custom build?  Or did it come that way?  Would like to make the exact same setup as that.  Any info would be appreciated.  Your other video's on your channel are cool too. The portable fish finder was a mod I did myself. This lowrance unit is from my boat but I use for ice fishing during the hard water times. I guess I could make a video of how I have it set up.  great job on the video, that must have taken a lot of editing and a few cameras .... I did bring a few cameras to shoot this. And it did take several hours to go through all the footage and edit it.  Very cool video... I'm more and more impressed every time you post one.I'm not sure if it's the camara angle or not.... But that hut looks like a mansion! Especially the inside shots.What a great day of fishing guys.As do St. John, where did you check on the ice? Usually St john freezes up before the coochG Having a 6 man hut is pretty spacious  but it is a bit heavier and cost more to heat up. I didn't check out St John myself, it was the guys I bumped into at Couch that told me that.  Wow great first trip of 2015. How thick is the ice at Couchiching? Cool video, by the way. Ice was at least 6" where I was.
The time editing was worth it, your videos are awesome, keep them coming, very cool!

Great video man.  Way way way to much set up for me though....  I would much rather open hole it.  Specially early in the season.  Gotta get your paws used to the cold!!!  I guess it all in the name of a good video though, so well worth it!  Keeps the videos coming!!!
Great job guys.  Excuse me while I start charging batteries for the weekend!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMxH7JLVdhc&feature=youtu.be

Thanks all for the kind words.   The portable fish finder was a mod I did myself. This lowrance unit is from my boat but I use for ice fishing during the hard water times. I guess I could make a video of how I have it set up.     That would be great Kevin!  It's an excellent setup and will suit me perfectly when I pick up my Helix 5 this spring.  Thanks.
Very well done.  Thanx
Great video & set-up on the ice. Got to like big perch hitting agressively on big baits.

Thanks for the video, I really enjoyed it! I stopped fishin Couch a few years ago, as I found that most if not all the perch I was catching, were wormy. Did you happen to find this as well or were those perch pretty clean? Again, thanks for posting! HH
awesome video! Looked like a good work out with all the hiking and setting up! Two best buds till the end. hah

Great video man.  Way way way to much set up for me though.... I would much rather open hole it. Specially early in the season. Gotta get your paws used to the cold!!! I guess it all in the name of a good video though, so well worth it!  Keeps the videos coming!!! You gotta do what you gotta do!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMxH7JLVdhc&feature=youtu.be LOL    That would be great Kevin!  It's an excellent setup and will suit me perfectly when I pick up my Helix 5 this spring.  Thanks. I'll get on that soon.  Thanks for the video, I really enjoyed it! I stopped fishin Couch a few years ago, as I found that most if not all the perch I was catching, were wormy. Did you happen to find this as well or were those perch pretty clean? Again, thanks for posting! HH I didn't keep any perch myself, it was the buddy that came along that took all the perch. I have seen/heard reports of there being grubs in them this ice season.  awesome video! Looked like a good work out with all the hiking and setting up! Two best buds till the end. hah YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO COME! told you to come!
slick video great production value
Finally get to give the new FUEL, a work out this weekend.  Love the vid.
Good stuff man! How are those spring bobbers treating ya?

It is nice to be young and talented. Now I know why the old timers way back when invited us to ice fish with them, drill the many holes for them with manual augers and set up the old Army tent. My 1st ever ice trip was on Couch. Ever thought about getting a few sled dogs?  Don't want to sound like a broken record but cool video guys, keep up the great work.  I have to say you guys sure fit a lot of equipment into that little red SUV you drive.
